briefdescription.para: Returns true if info describes a Pokit device.

detaileddescription.para: Currently, this is based on whether or not info's service UUIDs includes a known Pokit Status service, but this test criteria might be swapped for something else sometime.

briefdescription.para: Returns the PokitProduct corresponding the Bluetotoh device info.

detaileddescription.para: If info is not a Pokit device, then result is undefined.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if serviceUuids contains a known Pokit Status service UUID.

detaileddescription.para: Currently, this is the only known way to detect a Pokit device.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if controller describes a Pokit device.

detaileddescription.para: Currently, this is based on whether or not controller's service UUIDs includes a known Pokit Status service, but this test criteria might be swapped for something else sometime.

briefdescription.para: Returns the PokitProduct corresponding to the Bluetooth serviceUuids.

detaileddescription.para: Currently, this is based on whether or not servceUuids includes a known Pokit Status service, but this test criteria might be swapped for something else sometime.

briefdescription.para: Returns the PokitProduct corresponding to the Bluetooth controller.

detaileddescription.para: Currently, this is based on whether or not controller's service UUIDs includes a known Pokit Status service, but this test criteria might be swapped for something else sometime.

briefdescription.para: Returns product's capacitance range as a human-friendly string.

simplesect.para: Since Pokit Meters do not support capacitance measurement, product should not be PokitProduct::PokitMeter.

briefdescription.para: Returns the maximum value for product's range in (integer) nanofarads, or the string "Auto".

detaileddescription.para: If range is not a known valid value, then an null QVariant is returned.

simplesect.para: Since Pokit Meters do not support capacitance measurement, product should not be PokitProduct::PokitMeter.

briefdescription.para: Returns product's current range as a human-friendly string.
Returns the maximum value for product's range in (integer) microamps, or the string "Auto".

detaileddescription.para: If range is not a known valid value, then an null QVariant is returned.

briefdescription.para: Returns product's current range as a human-friendly string.
Returns the maximum value for product's range in (integer) ohms, or the string "Auto".

detaileddescription.para: If range is not a known valid value, then an null QVariant is returned.

briefdescription.para: Returns product's current range as a human-friendly string.
Returns the maximum value for product's range in (integer) millivolts, or the string "Auto".

detaileddescription.para: If range is not a known valid value, then an null QVariant is returned.
